com.sylconnexity.spring18.controller

Class DBPublisherController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sylconnexity.spring18.controller.DBPublisherController

  • @Controller
 @RequestMapping(path="/publishers")
public class DBPublisherController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for the Publisher class, the API of which is available at /publishers.

      void deletePublisher(java.lang.Long publisherID)
      Deletes a Publisher with the given ID and all of its associated links and clicks.

      Returns the Publisher with the given ID if it exists.

      Creates a new Publisher with the provided information.

      • getPublishers

        @Cacheable(value="Publishers")
 @GetMapping(path="")
 @ResponseBody
public java.lang.Iterable<Publisher> getPublishers(@RequestParam(value="username",defaultValue="")
                                                                                                                          java.lang.String username)
        Gets Publishers, filtering them by the given username if it is provided.
        Parameters:
        username - A username of Publishers
        Returns:
        A list of publishers, filtered by the provided username if given

      • getPublisherByID

        @Cacheable(value="Publisher")
 @GetMapping(path="/{id}")
 @ResponseBody
public Publisher getPublisherByID(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                                             java.lang.Long publisherID)
        Returns the Publisher with the given ID if it exists.
        Parameters:
        publisherID - The ID of a publisher
        Returns:
        The Publisher with the given ID, or null if it does not exist

      • savePublisher

        @CacheEvict(cacheNames={"Publisher","Publishers"},
            allEntries=true)
 @PostMapping(path="")
 @ResponseBody
public Publisher savePublisher(@RequestParam(value="username")
                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String username,
                                                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="apiKey")
                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String apiKey)
        Creates a new Publisher with the provided information.
        Parameters:
        username - Username associated with the influencer
        apiKey - Internal key utilized by ShopYourLikes API to authenticate access
        Returns:
        The newly created Publisher

      • savePublisherByID

        @CachePut(cacheNames="Publisher",
          key="#publisherID")
 @CacheEvict(cacheNames="Publishers",
            allEntries=true)
 @PostMapping(path="/{id}")
 @ResponseBody
public Publisher savePublisherByID(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                       java.lang.Long publisherID,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                       @RequestParam(value="username",defaultValue="")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                       java.lang.String username,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                       @RequestParam(value="apiKey",defaultValue="")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                       java.lang.String apiKey)
        Updates the username and API Key of the Publisher with the given ID if provided.
        Parameters:
        publisherID - The ID of a Publisher
        username - Username associated with the influencer
        apiKey - Internal key utilized by ShopYourLikes API to authenticate access
        Returns:
        The updated Publisher, or null if the original did not exist

      • deletePublisher

        @CacheEvict(cacheNames={"Click","Clicks","Link","Links","Publisher","Publishers"},
            allEntries=true)
 @DeleteMapping(path="/{id}")
 @ResponseBody
public void deletePublisher(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                                                                                                                             java.lang.Long publisherID)
        Deletes a Publisher with the given ID and all of its associated links and clicks.
        Parameters:
        publisherID - The ID of a publisher
